help-file.title: "DEMONIC RIDER"
help-file.content:
Demonic Riders are the ultimate horsemen. When mounted upon a Hellhound, they possess the ability to charge the enemy with their lance while nimbly sidestepping attacks.
Skills --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 31st level: Sidestep 41st level: Lance Charge
Innate Abilities --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 30th level: Knight
